data.name: Observations from Leading Merchant Businesses on Operating Remotely
data.summary:
What consumer behaviors during the pandemic may become permanent?
- How will commerce behaviors shift in the post-pandemic world?
- What will be the new priorities for the partner ecosystem in light of future crises?
data.speakers:
Prasun Jain, Product Management, Growth - Go Jek
Talha Ansari, Director Operations, Careem
